I'm busy Monday and Wednesday evenings (classes), I work 2 days a week (usually Thurs and Sat). I don't have a ton of film experience but I'm very eager to learn more, and I'm also extremely organized and reliable. My ideal would be to help out with a variety of jobs and learn as I go.
